Notes.Text:
This update for lua53 fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-6706: Fixed a use-after-free bug in the lua_upvaluejoin function of lapi.c (bsc#1123043)
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: Lua 5.3.5 has a use-after-free in lua_upvaluejoin in lapi.c. For example, a crash outcome might be achieved by an attacker who is able to trigger a debug.upvaluejoin call in which the arguments have certain relationships.
